text.div:
Tuberculosis (Tests for Mycobacterium tuberculosis by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    35352-4 Mycobacterium tuberculosis genotype [Identifier] in Isolate
    46244-0 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA rpoB [Identifier] by NAA with probe detection
    46245-7 Mycobacterium tuberculosis pncA gene pyrazinamide resistance mutation [Identifier] by Molecular method
    46246-5 Mycobacterium tuberculosis katG gene isoniazid high level resistance mutation [Identifier] by Molecular method
    46247-3 Mycobacterium tuberculosis embB gene ethambutol resistance mutation [Identifier] by Molecular method
    48175-4 Mycobacterium tuberculosis katG + inhA gene isoniazid resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    63072-3 Mycobacterium tuberculosis inhA gene isoniazid low level resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    72276-9 Mycobacterium tuberculosis gyrA gene fluoroquinolone resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    72864-2 Mycobacterium tuberculosis rpsL+rrs genes aminoglycoside resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    72865-9 Mycobacterium tuberculosis ethB gene ethionamide resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    72866-7 Mycobacterium tuberculosis ethA gene ethionamide resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    72867-5 Mycobacterium tuberculosis gyrB gene fluoroquinolone resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
